title: What is a Computer?
content:
A computer is an electronic device that processes data and performs tasks based on a set of instructions called a program. It can store, retrieve, and process information quickly and accurately.

Basic Components:
Hardware – Physical parts (e.g., CPU, monitor, keyboard, hard drive).

Software – Programs and operating systems that run on the hardware.

Main Functions:
Input (e.g., keyboard, mouse)

Processing (handled by the CPU)

Storage (e.g., hard drive, RAM)

Output (e.g., display, printer)

Types of Computers:
Desktop/Laptop – Personal computers for everyday use.

Servers – Powerful systems for managing networks and data.

Smartphones/Tablets – Portable computing devices.

Supercomputers – Very fast machines for scientific research.

Uses of Computers:
Communication (email, video calls)

Education and research

Business and finance

Entertainment (games, movies)

Programming and software development
